message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI, cs.CR 

The paper deals with person re-identification, which is a computer vision problem. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also proposes a new feature extraction method, which involves encoding motion patterns, and uses machine learning techniques to evaluate the performance of the proposed method. This suggests that the paper could also belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.MM (Multimedia), and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper deals with surveillance applications, which could fall under cs.CR (Cryptography and Security).
